Description: Fragment of belly of broad black-figure Clazomenian painted pottery amphora. Parts of women dancers. Purple for front and bottom border of skirts. White for flesh and patterning on skirts.
Curator's comments: From the same pot as Pl. GB 590, 3-4 (BM GR 1888,0208.113.a-b, 1888,0208.106.g). Perhaps from the same pot as Pl. GB 590, 1 (BM GR 1888,0208.73.a). The fragments from Tell Dafana seem to come from comparatively few pots, but such sherds as these do not allow convincing attribution. BSA xlvii, 131-CII.2.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 590, 3-4)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 149)
